quote: Life and time are the two best teachers. Life teaches us to make good use of time and time teaches us the value of life.
author: Time

quote: Time spent with family is time well spent. Family is the one constant element in life.
author: Time

quote: Time is like a river. You cant touch the same water twice, because the flow that has passed will never pass again.
author: Time

quote: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Time and good friends are two things that become more valuable the older you get.
author: Time

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: Life is like a train station people come and go all the time, but the ones that wait for the train with you are the ones that are worth keeping in it.
author: Time

quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
author: Lucille S. Harper

quote: Life is like a roller coaster. You can either scream every time there is a bump or you can throw your hands up and enjoy the ride.
author: Time

quote: They say that good things take time, but really great things happen in the blink of an eye.
author: Time

quote: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.
author: Alan Lakein

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What will I be doing in twenty years' time? I'll be dead, darling! Are you crazy?
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: All time management begins with planning.
author: Tom Greening

quote: It has been said time heals all wounds. I do not agree. The wounds remain. In time the mind protecting its sanity covers them with scar tissue and the pain lessens. But it is never gone.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Life is too short to make little decisions in a large amount of time.
author: Time

quote: Life just gives you time and space; its up to you to fill it.
author: Time

quote: Time is not measured by the passing of years but by what one does, what one feels, and what one achieves.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Time is precious, but truth is more precious than time.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Time is what keeps the light from reaching us. There is no greater obstacle to God than time: and not only time but temporalities, not only temporal things but temporal affections, not only temporal affections but the very taint and smell of time.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Good times become good memories and bad times become good lessons.
author: Time

quote: I get nervous every time, for every single performance, before getting up on that stage.
author: Thia Megia

quote: Nobody on their deathbed ever said, I wish I had spent more time at the office
author: Time

quote: A moment, a single moment of true joy is more powerful than a lifetime of sorrow
author: Time

quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
author: Eartha Kitt

quote: The more time you spend contemplating what you should have done... you lose valuable time planning what you can and will do.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
author: John Wooden

quote: We always have time enough, if we will but use it aright.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Theres just one life to live and theres no time to waste.
author: Time

quote: Anything that is wasted effort represents wasted time. The best management of our time thus becomes linked inseparably with the best utilization of our efforts.
author: Ted W. Engstrom

quote: Life is all about having a good time.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Having few true friends is better than having a large network of pretentious friends. Quality beats quantity all the time.
author: Time

quote: Time is money says the proverb, but turn it around and you get a precious truth. Money is time.
author: George Robert Gissing

quote: A single moment can spark a lifetime of memories.
author: Time

quote: Stop running away from your problems. Its time to face them.
author: Time

quote: To see the world in a grain of sand, and to see heaven in a wild flower, hold infinity in the palm of your hand, and eternity in an hour.
author: William Blake

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Time was a film run backward. Suns fled and ten million moons fled after them.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Time is more precious than gold more precious than diamonds more precious than oil or any valuable treasures. It is time that we do not have enough of it is time that causes the war within our hearts and so we must spend it wisely.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: The police are the public and the public are the police; the police being only members of the public who are paid to give full time attention to duties which are incumbent on every citizen in the interests of community welfare and existence.
author: Robert Peel

quote: Nothing valuable can be lost by taking time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
author: Martin Luther

quote: You cannot protect two things at the same time. If you dont make a decision, you will lose both.
author: Time

quote: Has it ever struck you that life is all memory except for the one present moment that goes by you so quick you hardly catch it going
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quote: Time and tide wait for no man, but time always stands still for a woman of 30.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Never get discouraged when things go beyond your expectation. Always remember that the greatest glory in life is not winning, but rising every time we fall.
author: Time

quote: I have a hard time deciphering the fine line between boredom and hunger
author: Time

quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
author: Trey Parker

quote: Time is the most undefinable yet paradoxical of things; the past is gone, the future is not come, and the present becomes the past even while we attempt to define it, and, like the flash of lightning, at once exists and expires.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Islam expect every Muslim to do this duty, and if we realise our responsibility time will come soon when we shall justify ourselves worthy of a glorious past.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Wait for the wisest of all counselors, Time.
author: Pericles

quote: Theres no need to rush. Whats meant for you always arrives right on time.
author: Time

quote: Time spent on hiring is time well spent.
author: Robert Half

quote: A man is the sum of his misfortunes. One day youd think misfortune would get tired  but then time is your misfortune
author: William Faulkner

quote: There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
author: Malcolm X

quote: never before have we had so little time in which to do so much.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Time stands still for nobody. Live each moment and enjoy it because when its passed you cant get it back.
author: Time

quote: If you can look into the seeds of time, and say which grain will grow and which will not, speak then unto me.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A girl can wait for the right man to come along but in the meantime that still doesn't mean she can't have a wonderful time with all the wrong ones.
author: Cher

quote: Tough times dont last, but tough people do.
author: Time

quote: He that rises late must trot all day.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Since you cannot do good to all, you are to pay special attention to those who, by the accidents of time, or place, or circumstances, are brought into closer connection with you.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: It has been my observation that most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Employ thy time well, if thou meanest to gain leisure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, or a parent.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: No thieves, no traitors, no interventionists! This time the revolution is for real!
author: Fidel Castro

quote: There comes a time when the mind takes a higher plane of knowledge but can never prove how it got there.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The difference between a democracy and a dictatorship is that in a democracy you vote first and take orders later; in a dictatorship you don't have to waste your time voting.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
author: George Orwell

quote: An inch of time cannot be bought with an inch of gold.
author: Chinese Proverbs

quote: Money cant buy you time, but it can buy you a good cappuccino while youre procrastinating.
author: Time

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Protect your spirit from contamination. Limit your time with negative people.
author: Time

quote: Dont waste your time looking back at what you have lost. Move on, for life is not meant to be travelled backwards
author: Time

quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: I'm very emotional; I think I may go mad in several years' time.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: its a complicated world. People have a hard time finding each other & even when they do, theyre scared to take the risk..!
author: Time

quote: Accepting many wrong persons may not affect your life But Neglecting one right person will leave you broken throughout the life..Thats what we do most of the time.
author: Time

quote: Everything is valuable only at two times; before getting it, and after losing it.
author: Time

quote: Some people make promises just to buy more time, so dont believe it until you see it.
author: Time

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
author: Homer

quote: O, call back yesterday, bid time return.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I saw a bank that said 24 Hour Banking, but I don't have that much time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: A loafer always has the correct time.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The Eternal looked upon me for a moment with His eye of power, and annihilated me in His being, and become manifest to me in His essence. I saw I existed through Him.
author: Rumi

quote: Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time and tide wait for no man, but time always stands still for a woman of 30.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Never get discouraged when things go beyond your expectation. Always remember that the greatest glory in life is not winning, but rising every time we fall.
author: Time

quote: I have a hard time deciphering the fine line between boredom and hunger
author: Time

quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
author: Trey Parker

quote: Time is the most undefinable yet paradoxical of things; the past is gone, the future is not come, and the present becomes the past even while we attempt to define it, and, like the flash of lightning, at once exists and expires.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Time is the most undefinable yet paradoxical of things; the past is gone, the future is not come, and the present becomes the past even while we attempt to define it, and, like the flash of lightning, at once exists and expires.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Islam expect every Muslim to do this duty, and if we realise our responsibility time will come soon when we shall justify ourselves worthy of a glorious past.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Wait for the wisest of all counselors, Time.
author: Pericles

quote: Theres no need to rush. Whats meant for you always arrives right on time.
author: Time

quote: Time spent on hiring is time well spent.
author: Robert Half

quote: A man is the sum of his misfortunes. One day youd think misfortune would get tired  but then time is your misfortune
author: William Faulkner

quote: There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
author: Malcolm X

quote: never before have we had so little time in which to do so much.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Time stands still for nobody. Live each moment and enjoy it because when its passed you cant get it back.
author: Time

quote: If you can look into the seeds of time, and say which grain will grow and which will not, speak then unto me.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A girl can wait for the right man to come along but in the meantime that still doesn't mean she can't have a wonderful time with all the wrong ones.
author: Cher

quote: Tough times dont last, but tough people do.
author: Time

quote: He that rises late must trot all day.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Since you cannot do good to all, you are to pay special attention to those who, by the accidents of time, or place, or circumstances, are brought into closer connection with you.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: It has been my observation that most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Employ thy time well, if thou meanest to gain leisure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, or a parent.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: No thieves, no traitors, no interventionists! This time the revolution is for real!
author: Fidel Castro

quote: There comes a time when the mind takes a higher plane of knowledge but can never prove how it got there.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The difference between a democracy and a dictatorship is that in a democracy you vote first and take orders later; in a dictatorship you don't have to waste your time voting.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
author: George Orwell

quote: An inch of time cannot be bought with an inch of gold.
author: Chinese Proverbs

quote: Money cant buy you time, but it can buy you a good cappuccino while youre procrastinating.
author: Time

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Protect your spirit from contamination. Limit your time with negative people.
author: Time

quote: Dont waste your time looking back at what you have lost. Move on, for life is not meant to be travelled backwards
author: Time

quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: I'm very emotional; I think I may go mad in several years' time.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: its a complicated world. People have a hard time finding each other & even when they do, theyre scared to take the risk..!
author: Time

quote: Accepting many wrong persons may not affect your life But Neglecting one right person will leave you broken throughout the life..Thats what we do most of the time.
author: Time

quote: Everything is valuable only at two times; before getting it, and after losing it.
author: Time

quote: Some people make promises just to buy more time, so dont believe it until you see it.
author: Time

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
author: Homer

quote: O, call back yesterday, bid time return.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I saw a bank that said 24 Hour Banking, but I don't have that much time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: A loafer always has the correct time.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The Eternal looked upon me for a moment with His eye of power, and annihilated me in His being, and become manifest to me in His essence. I saw I existed through Him.
author: Rumi

quote: Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
author: Benjamin Franklin
